20-025SC.summary: Emails received for the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, December 10, 2020.REGULAR AGENDA1.

20-024SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting held Thursday, October 22, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Wheeler, seconded by Commissioner Novak, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 5 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye and Morgan WheelerAbstain: 1 - Sona CoffeeAbsent: 4 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff2.

20-022SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the County of Los Angeles on the Our County Countywide Sustainability Plan.Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke. Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Coffee spoke.Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer.Page 2 of 5HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, DECEMBER 10, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESVice Chair Wheeler spoke.Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Wheeler and Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Gary Gero, LA County Chief Sustainability Officer.Chair Coffee spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Vice Chair Wheeler, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 4 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff3.
